heading: QuantConnect
content: QuantConnect was founded in 2012 to serve quants everywhere with the best possible algorithmic trading technology. Seeking to disrupt a notoriously closed-source industry, QuantConnect takes a radically open-source approach to algorithmic trading. Through the QuantConnect web platform, more than 50,000 quants are served every month.

featureShortDescription.02: Select constituent US Equities from ETFs
featureShortDescription.03: Select US Equities by price, volume, and dollar volume
featureShortDescription.04: Splits, devidends, delistings, symbol change events of US Equities
